title: Determine if score is within ten points of target

content.prompt: Which of the following Boolean expressions will evaluate to true if and only if score is within 10 points of target ?

choices.label: (score ≤ target + 10) AND (target + 10 ≤ score)
(target + 10 ≤ score) AND (score ≤ target - 10)
(score ≤ target - 10) AND (score ≤ target + 10)
(target - 10 ≤ score) AND (score ≤ target + 10)

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
